templates.name: Job Application
templates.subject: Application for {{position}} position
templates.content:
Dear {{name}},

I am writing to apply for the {{position}} position at {{company}}. With my background in {{field}}, I believe I would be a strong addition to your team.

Best regards,
{{sender_name}}

templates.name: Meeting Follow-up
templates.subject: Follow-up: {{meeting_topic}} Discussion
templates.content:
Hi {{name}},

Thank you for taking the time to meet regarding {{meeting_topic}}. I wanted to follow up on our discussion about {{key_point}}.

Best,
{{sender_name}}

templates.name: Sales Pitch
templates.subject: Enhancing {{company}}'s {{department}} with Our Solution
templates.content:
Dear {{name}},

I noticed that {{company}} is looking to improve its {{department}}. Our solution has helped similar companies achieve {{benefit}}.

Would you be interested in a brief demo?

Best regards,
{{sender_name}}

templates.name: Partnership Proposal
templates.subject: Partnership Opportunity: {{company}} x {{partner_company}}
templates.content:
Dear {{name}},

I'm reaching out regarding a potential partnership between {{company}} and {{partner_company}} in the {{industry}} space.

Best regards,
{{sender_name}}

templates.name: Event Invitation
templates.subject: You're Invited: {{event_name}}
templates.content:
Dear {{name}},

We would like to invite you to {{event_name}}, happening on {{event_date}}. This {{event_type}} will feature {{event_highlights}}.

Best regards,
{{sender_name}}

templates.name: Project Update
templates.subject: {{project_name}} Project Update
templates.content:
Hi {{name}},

I wanted to provide an update on the {{project_name}} project. We've completed {{milestone}} and are on track for {{next_milestone}}.

Best,
{{sender_name}}

templates.name: Service Proposal
templates.subject: {{service_type}} Services for {{company}}
templates.content:
Dear {{name}},

Based on our discussion about {{company}}'s needs, I've prepared a proposal for our {{service_type}} services.

Best regards,
{{sender_name}}

templates.name: Thank You Note
templates.subject: Thank You for {{occasion}}
templates.content:
Dear {{name}},

I wanted to thank you for {{occasion}}. Your {{contribution_type}} was greatly appreciated.

Best regards,
{{sender_name}}

templates.name: Introduction Email
templates.subject: Introduction: {{sender_name}} from {{company}}
templates.content:
Hi {{name}},

{{mutual_contact}} suggested I reach out to you regarding {{topic}}. I work with {{company}} and we specialize in {{specialty}}.

Best regards,
{{sender_name}}

templates.name: Feedback Request
templates.subject: Quick Feedback on {{topic}}
templates.content:
Hi {{name}},

We value your opinion and would love to get your feedback on {{topic}}. Your insights would help us {{purpose}}.

Best regards,
{{sender_name}}
